seniority_level.evidence: 3-7 years of experience suggests mid-level role. Title doesn't explicitly indicate senior.

job_family.evidence: Title is Application Developer-Process Management (BPM) but description focuses on data gathering, storage, and processing, aligning with data engineering.

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on data gathering, storage, and batch processing. BPM tools suggest ETL workflows.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities focus on individual contribution with no mention of team leadership or management.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Emphasis on batch processing and ETL workflows with BPM tools.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Integration with enterprise systems via APIs and web services suggests cloud-native orchestration.

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage layer (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, implying a restriction to India.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in India suggests an APAC timezone focus.

relocation_required.evidence: Job posting is located in a specific city, implying no relocation is needed.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is 'full_time' and contract type is 'permanent', suggesting a W2 position.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are explicitly mentioned in the job description.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied discussion of career paths or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs or working with senior engineers.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion or advancement opportunities.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.).

requirement_strictness.evidence: Mix of 'must have' (experience with Appian) and 'preferred' skills.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on BPM application development and integration.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills requested are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer role.
